return_description: A localized string suitable for displaying to users that describes the specified status code.

Methods.method_description: Returns a localized string corresponding to a specified HTTP status code.

Vars.var_description: All HTTP header fields of the response.

class_description: The HTTPURLResponse class is a subclass of URLResponse that provides methods for accessing information specific to HTTP protocol responses. Whenever you make HTTP URL load requests, any response objects you get back from the URLSession, NSURLConnection, or NSURLDownload class are instances of the HTTPURLResponse class.
